interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Luxsea 12 Colors Liquid Eyeliner Kit Matte and Glitter Colorful Cosmetic Pen Set Lasting Highly-Pigmented Extremely Fine Easy to Wear Waterproof Eye Liner Makeup Pen Set
Review Date: 2021/07/15
Store: uxsea
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'uxsea', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic,Glitter,Shimmer,Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 5.51 x 0.55 inches; 0.71 Ounces'}
Review Text: The colors and very pretty. But when putting the liner on my eyes, I dipped the liner in the color, and went to apply it to my eye, but it's just not that great. It starts out going on smoothly, but its like it dries out mid stride across my lid. So other than the beautiful colors, I have nothing more good to say about these liquid eyeliners.
Review Title: Too Fast Drying Liner
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Unfortunately, when I first used this, it caused a rash. I passed it on to a friend of mine, who seems to like it. Saying, "her skin feels so soft and smooth."
Sharing with friends
Daletu Nail Clips, 10PCS Clear Nail Clips Finger Extension Fixed Clip, Quick Building Finger Builder Nail Clamps, Nails Art DIY Manicure Tool
Daletu
{'Size': 'Large', 'Brand': 'Daletu', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '4.09 x 3.9 x 2.01 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738634020063'}
I use the polygel nails, and from time to time, I need to clip it on to hold it on until it gets completely dry. I got these clips to help aid in holding my nails in place. But for some reason, these clips leave dents in my nails. I  had to redo them totally. 1 star is the lowest  I can go.
Dents in nails

profile:
The user demonstrates a strong preference for natural and organic skincare products, particularly those focused on moisturizing and nourishing properties. They favor body scrubs with natural exfoliators to achieve smooth, soft skin. Recent interactions reveal a cautious approach to product selection due to past adverse reactions, notably a rash, which indicates sensitivity to certain formulations. This concern is highlighted by a low rating given to a product that failed to meet their performance expectations.

Additionally, the user values sharing experiences with friends, often passing unsuitable products to others who can benefit from them, reflecting a communal aspect to their preferences for effective and recommendable items. A new interest in nail care has emerged, with the user purchasing clips for polygel nails, although they encountered issues that resulted in dents in their nails, leading to a very low rating. 

In a more recent interaction, the user purchased a set of liquid eyeliners, noting their appealing colors but ultimately expressing dissatisfaction with the product due to its quick drying time when applied, resulting in a low rating. This underscores their continued emphasis on product performance and gentleness, while also illustrating a broader interest in various beauty products, all while maintaining their cautious approach to suitability and effectiveness.
